title: Pickup on South Street (restored, with intro and outro commentary) (1953, film noir, imdb score: 7.6)

sources.title: Pickup on South Street (restored, with intro and outro commentary) (1953, film noir, imdb score: 7.6)
sources.description: Pickup on South Street is a 1953 American spy film noir written and directed by Samuel Fuller , and starring Richard Widmark , Jean Peters , and Thelma Ritter . Widmark plays a pickpocket who unwittingly steals a covert microfilm sought by foreign agents. The film combines elements of the traditional crime film noir with Cold War -era espionage drama. It was released by 20th Century-Fox . The film was screened at the 14th Venice International Film Festival , where it won the Bronze Lion. Thelma Ritterâ€™s performance earned her an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress . In 2018, Pickup on South Street was selected for preservation in the United States National Film Registry as being "culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant."
